00028 image_classification_forest::image_classification_forest(LEARNPROGRESSION _LearnProgress) 
00029                                                          : image_classifier(_LearnProgress)
00030 {
00031   weights=0;
00032 }

00034 image_classification_forest::image_classification_forest(int _image_width, int _image_height, int _class_number, 
00035                                                          int _max_depth, int _tree_number, 
00036                                                          LEARNPROGRESSION _LearnProgress) 
00037                                                          : image_classifier(_image_width, _image_height, _class_number,_LearnProgress)
00038 {
00039   max_depth = _max_depth;
00040   tree_number = _tree_number;
00041 
00042   thresholds = misclassification_rates = 0;
00043 
00044   weights = new float[class_number];
00045   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00046     weights[i] = 0;
00047 }

00050 bool image_classification_forest::load(string directory_name)
00051 {
00052   int i = 0;
00053   bool ok;
00054   
00055   thresholds = misclassification_rates = 0;
00056   cout << "Reading Forest in " << directory_name << ":" << endl;
00057 
00058   // Read the trees:
00059   do
00060   {
00061     char tree_filename[1000];
00062     sprintf(tree_filename, "%s/tree%04d.txt", directory_name.data(), i);
00063 
00064     ifstream ifs(tree_filename);
00065     ok = ifs.is_open();
00066     if (ok)
00067     {
00068       cout << " Reading " << tree_filename << ": " << flush;
00069 
00070       image_classification_tree * tree = new image_classification_tree();
00071       
00072       if ( !tree->load(tree_filename) ) 
00073       {
00074         delete tree; 
00075         return false; 
00076       }
00077 
00078       trees.push_back(tree);
00079       i++;
00080     }
00081   } while(ok);
00082   if (trees.size() == 0 ) return false;
00083 
00084   image_width = (*trees.begin())->image_width;
00085   image_height = (*trees.begin())->image_height;
00086   class_number = (*trees.begin())->class_number;
00087   max_depth = (*trees.begin())->max_depth;
00088 
00089   // Read weight file:
00090   weights = new float[class_number];
00091   char weights_filename[1000];
00092   sprintf(weights_filename, "%s/weights.txt", directory_name.data());
00093   ifstream wfs(weights_filename);
00094   for(i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00095     wfs >> weights[i];
00096   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin(); tree_it < trees.end(); tree_it++)
00097     (*tree_it)->root->load_probability_sums_recursive(wfs);
00098   wfs.close();
00099 
00100   // Read threshold file:
00101   if (thresholds != 0)
00102     delete [] thresholds;
00103   thresholds = new float [class_number];
00104 
00105   char thresholds_filename[1000];
00106   sprintf(thresholds_filename, "%s/thresholds.txt", directory_name.data());
00107   ifstream tfs(thresholds_filename);
00108   for(i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00109     tfs >> thresholds[i];
00110   tfs.close();
00111 
00112   // Read misclas rates file:
00113   if (misclassification_rates != 0)
00114     delete [] misclassification_rates;
00115   misclassification_rates = new float [class_number];
00116 
00117   char misclassification_rates_filename[1000];
00118   sprintf(misclassification_rates_filename, "%s/misclassification_rates.txt", directory_name.data());
00119   ifstream rfs(misclassification_rates_filename);
00120   if (rfs.good())
00121   {
00122     for(i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00123       rfs >> misclassification_rates[i];
00124     rfs.close();
00125   }
00126   else
00127     for(i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00128       misclassification_rates[i] = 0.42f;
00129 
00130   cout << "Done." << endl;
00131 
00132   return true;
00133 }
00134 
00135 image_classification_forest::~image_classification_forest()
00136 {
00137   if (weights != 0) {
00138     delete [] weights;
00139     weights = 0;
00140   }
00141 
00142   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin(); tree_it < trees.end(); tree_it++)
00143    delete (*tree_it);
00144 
00145   if (thresholds != 0)
00146     delete [] thresholds;
00147 
00148   if (misclassification_rates != 0)
00149     delete [] misclassification_rates;
00150 }

00153 {
00154   directory_name = _directory_name;

00157 void image_classification_forest::create_trees_at_random(void)
00158 {
00159   for(int i = 0; i < tree_number; i++)
00160   {
00161     if (LearnProgression!=0) 
00162       LearnProgression(BUILDING_TREE, i, tree_number);
00163 
00164     cout << "FOREST: BUILDING TREE # " << i << endl;
00165 
00166     image_classification_tree * tree = new image_classification_tree(image_width, image_height, 
00167                                                                      class_number, max_depth);
00168 
00169     tree->root = new image_classification_node(0, class_number);
00170     tree->root->index = 0;
00171 
00172     vector <image_classification_node*> L;
00173     L.reserve(30);
00174     L.push_back(tree->root);
00175 
00176     int new_node_index = 1;
00177 
00178     while(!L.empty())
00179     {
00180       cout << "BUILDING RANDOM TREE: ~ " << new_node_index << " nodes.\r" << flush;
00181 
00182       image_classification_node * node = (image_classification_node *)L.back();
00183       L.pop_back();
00184 
00185       node->set_Dot(image_width, image_height);
00186 
00187       if (node->depth < max_depth - 2)
00188       {
00189         node->expand();
00190 
00191         for(int i = 0; i < node->children_number; i++)
00192           L.push_back(node->children[i]);
00193       }
00194       else
00195         node->end_recursion();
00196 
00197       for(int i = 0; i < node->children_number; i++)
00198       {
00199         node->children[i]->index = new_node_index;
00200         new_node_index++;
00201       }
00202     }
00203 
00204     cout << "Random tree built (" << tree->node_number() << " nodes)." << endl;
00205 
00206     trees.push_back(tree);
00207   }
00208 }
00209 
00210 // Refine the posterior probabilities stored in the leaves for each tree
00211 void image_classification_forest::refine(example_generator * vg, int call_number)
00212 {
00213   for(int i = 0; i < call_number; i++)
00214   {
00215     if (LearnProgression!=0) 
00216       LearnProgression(FOREST_REFINEMENT, i, call_number);
00217 
00218     cout << "FOREST REFINEMENT: " << call_number - i << "...    " << (char)13 << flush;
00219 
00220     vector<image_class_example *> * examples = vg->generate_random_examples();
00221 
00222     for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator example_it = examples->begin(); example_it < examples->end(); example_it++) 
00223     {
00224       for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin(); tree_it < trees.end(); tree_it++)
00225       {
00226         image_classification_node * node = (*tree_it)->root;
00227         unsigned char * I = (unsigned char *)((*example_it)->preprocessed->imageData);
00228 
00229         while(!node->is_leaf()) 
00230         { 
00231           int dot_product = (int)I[node->d1] - (int)I[node->d2];
00232 
00233           if (dot_product <= 0) 
00234             node = node->children[0];
00235           else 
00236             node = node->children[1];
00237         }
00238         node->P[(*example_it)->class_index]++;
00239       }
00240       weights[(*example_it)->class_index]++;
00241     }
00242 
00243     delete examples;
00244 
00245     vg->release_examples();
00246   }
00247 
00248   cout << "Reweighted refinement: " << endl;
00249 
00250   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00251     if (weights[i] == 0)
00252       weights[i] = 0;
00253     else
00254       weights[i] = 1 / weights[i];
00255 
00256   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin(); tree_it < trees.end(); tree_it++)
00257     (*tree_it)->root->reestimate_probabilities_recursive(weights);
00258 
00259   cout << "Forest refinement done (" << call_number << " calls to generate_random_examples).            " << endl;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void image_classification_forest::restore_occurances()
00263 {
00264   assert(weights);
00265 
00266   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin(); tree_it < trees.end(); tree_it++)
00267     (*tree_it)->root->restore_occurances_recursive(weights);
00268 
00269   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; ++i)
00270     weights[i] = weights[i] > 0 ? 1 / weights[i] : 0.0f;
00271 }
00272 
00273 void image_classification_forest::reset_class_occurances(int class_index)
00274 {
00275   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin(); tree_it < trees.end(); tree_it++)
00276     (*tree_it)->root->reset_class_occurances_recursive(class_index);
00277 
00278   weights[class_index] = 0.0f;
00279 }
00280 
00281 void image_classification_forest::test(example_generator * vg, int call_number)
00282 {
00283   int * inlier_total = new int[class_number];
00284   int * total = new int[class_number];
00285 
00286   int ** correct_samples   = new int*[class_number];
00287   int ** uncorrect_samples = new int*[class_number];
00288 
00289   const float step = 0.01f;
00290   int bin_number = int(1. / step);
00291   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00292   {
00293     inlier_total[i] = total[i] = 0;
00294     
00295     correct_samples[i] = new int[bin_number];
00296     uncorrect_samples[i] = new int[bin_number];
00297     for(int j = 0; j < bin_number; j++)
00298       correct_samples[i][j] = uncorrect_samples[i][j] = 0;
00299   }
00300 
00301   for(int i = 0; i < call_number; i++)
00302   {
00303     if (LearnProgression!=0) 
00304       LearnProgression(GENERATING_TESTING_SET, i, call_number);
00305     
00306     cout << "GENERATING TESTING SET: " << call_number - i << "... " << (char)13 << flush;
00307 
00308     vector<image_class_example *> * examples = vg->generate_random_examples();
00309 
00310     for(vector<image_class_example *>::iterator it = examples->begin(); it < examples->end(); it++)
00311     {
00312       float score;
00313       int found_class_index = recognize(*it, &score);
00314 
00315       int bin_index = int(score / step);
00316       if (bin_index < 0) bin_index = 0;
00317       if (bin_index >= bin_number) bin_index = bin_number - 1;
00318 
00319       total[(*it)->class_index]++;
00320       if ((*it)->class_index == found_class_index)
00321       {
00322         inlier_total[found_class_index]++;
00323         correct_samples[found_class_index][bin_index]++;
00324       }
00325       else
00326         uncorrect_samples[found_class_index][bin_index]++;
00327     }
00328 
00329     delete examples;
00330 
00331     vg->release_examples();
00332   }
00333 
00334   // Estimate inlier rates and estimate thresholds:
00335   cout << "Testing: " << endl;
00336   cout << "Classification rate = [#p | Y(p) = c = Y^(p)] / [#p | Y(p) = c = Y^(p) or Y(p) != c = Y^(p)]" << endl;
00337   cout << "Ambiguity measure   = [#p | Y(p) = c != Y^(p)] / [#p | Y(p) = c = Y^(p)]" << endl;
00338 
00339   if (misclassification_rates != 0)
00340     delete [] misclassification_rates;
00341   misclassification_rates = new float [class_number];
00342 
00343   int T = 0, IT = 0;
00344   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00345   {
00346     if (total[i] == 0)
00347       misclassification_rates[i] = 0.5;
00348     else
00349       misclassification_rates[i] = 1.f - float(inlier_total[i]) / total[i];
00350 
00351     T += total[i];
00352     IT += inlier_total[i];
00353   }
00354 
00355   float inlier_percentage = 100.f * float(IT) / T;
00356 
00357   if (thresholds != 0)
00358     delete [] thresholds;
00359   thresholds = new float [class_number];
00360 
00361   float desired_inlier_rate = 0.6f;
00362   float ambiguity_rate_mean = 0;
00363   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00364   {
00365     cout << "CLASS " << setw(4) << i << ": ";
00366     int correct_number = 0, uncorrect_number = 0;
00367     int j;
00368     for(j = bin_number - 1; j >= 0; j--)
00369     {
00370       correct_number += correct_samples[i][j];
00371       uncorrect_number += uncorrect_samples[i][j];
00372       if (float(correct_number) / (correct_number + uncorrect_number) < desired_inlier_rate &&
00373           (correct_number + uncorrect_number) > 10)
00374         break;
00375     }
00376     thresholds[i] = j * step;
00377     cout << setw(5) << total[i] << " generated samples, ";
00378     cout << setw(4) << " T = " << setw(8) << thresholds[i] << ", ";
00379     cout << setw(6) << setprecision(3) << 100. * float(inlier_total[i]) / total[i] << "% inliers, " << flush;
00380 
00381     correct_number = 0; uncorrect_number = 0;
00382     for(int j = bin_number - 1; j >= 0; j--)
00383     {
00384       correct_number += correct_samples[i][j];
00385       uncorrect_number += uncorrect_samples[i][j];
00386     }
00387     if (correct_number != 0)
00388     {
00389       ambiguity_rate_mean += float(uncorrect_number) / correct_number;
00390       cout << "Ambig: " << setw(4) << setprecision(3) << float(uncorrect_number) / correct_number << endl;
00391     }
00392     else
00393     {
00394       ambiguity_rate_mean += 2.;
00395       cout << "Ambig: +oo" << endl;
00396     }
00397   }
00398   cout << "-------------------------------------------" << endl;
00399   cout << " GLOBAL ESTIMATION: " << setprecision(4) << inlier_percentage << "% inliers." << endl;
00400   ambiguity_rate_mean /= class_number;
00401   cout << "         E[Ambig] = " << ambiguity_rate_mean << endl;
00402   cout << "-------------------------------------------" << endl;
00403 
00404   // Clear allocated arrays:
00405   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00406   {
00407     delete [] correct_samples[i];
00408     delete [] uncorrect_samples[i];
00409   }
00410 
00411   delete [] correct_samples;
00412   delete [] uncorrect_samples;
00413 
00414   delete [] total;
00415   delete [] inlier_total;
00416 }
00417 
00418 int image_classification_forest::recognize(image_class_example * pv, float * confidence, int tree_number)
00419 {
00420   float * p = posterior_probabilities(pv, tree_number);
00421   int best_class = 0;
00422   float best_p = p[best_class];
00423 
00424   for(int i = 1; i < class_number; i++)
00425     if (p[i] > best_p)
00426     {
00427       best_p = p[i];
00428       best_class = i;
00429     }
00430 
00431   delete [] p;
00432 
00433   if (confidence != 0)
00434     *confidence = best_p;
00435 
00436   return best_class;
00437 }
00438 
00439 float * image_classification_forest::posterior_probabilities(image_class_example * pv, int tree_number)
00440 {
00441   float * p = new float[class_number];
00442 
00443   posterior_probabilities(pv, p, tree_number);
00444 
00445   return p;
00446 }
00447 
00448 void image_classification_forest::posterior_probabilities(image_class_example * pv, float * p, int tree_number)
00449 {
00450   if (tree_number < 0)
00451   {
00452     for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00453       p[i] = 0.;
00454 
00455     for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin();
00456         tree_it < trees.end(); 
00457         tree_it++)
00458     {
00459       float * tree_p = (*tree_it)->posterior_probabilities(pv);
00460 
00461       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00462         p[i] += tree_p[i];
00463     }
00464 
00465     float inv_tree_number = 1.f / trees.size();
00466     for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00467       p[i] *= inv_tree_number;
00468   }
00469   else 
00470   {
00471     for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00472       p[i] = 0.;
00473 
00474     int n = 0;
00475     if (tree_number < 0)
00476       tree_number = trees.size();
00477 
00478     for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin();
00479       tree_it < trees.end(); 
00480       tree_it++)
00481     {
00482       float * tree_p = (*tree_it)->posterior_probabilities(pv);
00483 
00484       for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00485         p[i] += tree_p[i];
00486 
00487       n++;
00488       if (n > tree_number) break;
00489     }
00490 
00491     float inv_class_number = 1.f / tree_number;
00492     for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00493       p[i] *= inv_class_number;
00494   }
00495 }
00496 
00497 void image_classification_forest::change_class_number_and_reset_probabilities(int new_class_number)
00498 {
00499   class_number = new_class_number;
00500 
00501   if(weights != 0) {
00502     delete [] weights;
00503     weights = 0;
00504   }
00505   weights = new float[class_number];
00506   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00507     weights[i] = 0;
00508 
00509   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin();
00510       tree_it < trees.end(); 
00511       tree_it++) 
00512   {
00513     (*tree_it)->change_class_number_and_reset_probabilities(new_class_number);
00514   }
00515 }
00516 
00517 bool image_classification_forest::save(string directory_name)
00518 {
00519   int tree_index = 0;
00520 
00521   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin();
00522       tree_it < trees.end(); 
00523       tree_it++)
00524   {
00525     char tree_name[1000];
00526 
00527     sprintf(tree_name, "%s/tree%04d.txt", directory_name.data(), tree_index);
00528 
00529     (*tree_it)->save(tree_name);
00530 
00531     tree_index++;
00532   }
00533 
00534   // Save thresholds:
00535   char thresholds_filename[1000];
00536   sprintf(thresholds_filename, "%s/thresholds.txt", directory_name.data());
00537   ofstream tfs(thresholds_filename);
00538   if (!tfs.good()) return false;
00539   tfs << setw(12) << setprecision(12);
00540   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00541     tfs << thresholds[i] << endl;
00542   tfs.close();
00543 
00544   // Save misclassification rates:
00545   char misclassification_rates_filename[1000];
00546   sprintf(misclassification_rates_filename, "%s/misclassification_rates.txt", directory_name.data());
00547   ofstream rfs(misclassification_rates_filename);
00548   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00549     rfs << misclassification_rates[i] << endl;
00550   rfs.close();
00551 
00552   // Save weights and probability_sum's.
00553   char weights_filename[1000];
00554   sprintf(weights_filename, "%s/weights.txt", directory_name.data());
00555   ofstream wfs(weights_filename);
00556   for(int i = 0; i < class_number; i++)
00557     wfs << weights[i] << endl;
00558   for(vector<image_classification_tree *>::iterator tree_it = trees.begin(); tree_it < trees.end(); tree_it++)
00559   {
00560     (*tree_it)->root->save_probability_sums_recursive(wfs);
00561     wfs << endl;
00562   }
00563   wfs.close();
00564   
00565 
00566   return true;
00567 }
